Re: Fwd: counsel having difficulty meeting with client
From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
To: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
Date: 2019/07/07 20:49
Subject: Re: Fwd: counsel having difficulty meeting with client
Attachments: TEXT.htm
I will pass this information to the Lieutenants.
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
Captain
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, NY 10007
Office: (646) 836 (b)(6)
Blackberry (646) (b)(6)
(b)(7)(C)
@bop.gov> 7/7/2019 6:22 PM >>>
I have verified (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) is an attorney in good standing in Massachusetts. He is permitted to visit Jeffrey Epstein.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (USANYS (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov>
Date: 7/7/19 6:18 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Subject: RE: counsel having difficulty meeting with client
>>> (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (USANYS)" 07/07/2019 18:18 >>>
Massachusetts
From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Sent: Sunday, July 07, 2019 18:18
To: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>; (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (USANYS) (b)(6) @usa.doj.gov>
Subject: Re: counsel having difficulty meeting with client
Sorry (b)(6) just seeing this now. Where is he barred?
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (USANYS)" (b)(6) @usdoj.gov<mailto:(b)(6) @usdoj.gov>>
Date: 7/7/19 5:36 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: (b)(6) @bop.gov<mailto:(b)(6) @bop.gov>>; (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov<mailto:(b)(6) @bop.gov>>
Subject: RE: counsel having difficulty meeting with client
>>> (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (USANYS)" 07/07/2019 17:36 >>>
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
With apologies for the weekend email, we have a defendant, Jeffrey Epstein, who was arrested last night and is currently being detained at MCC, and is expected to be present of-state.
We're concerned about the defendant not having access to his attorney in advance of the presentment (as we would be for any defendant) and so I wanted to reach out to
thanks very much,
(b)(6)
Page 10402
DOJ-OGR-00023924

------- Original message -------
From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (USANYS)" (b)(6) @usdoj.gov<mailto:(b)(6) @usdoj.gov>>
Date: 7/7/19 5:36 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: (b)(6) @bop.gov<mailto:(b)(6) @bop.gov>>; (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov<mailto:(b)(6) @bop.gov>>
Subject: RE: counsel having difficulty meeting with client
With apologies for the weekend email, we have a defendant, Jeffrey Epstein, who was arrested last night and is currently being detained at MCC, and is expected to be present of-state.
We're concerned about the defendant not having access to his attorney in advance of the presentment (as we would be for any defendant) and so I wanted to reach out to

additional_notes: The document is an email chain discussing Jeffrey Epstein's detention and access to his attorney. The emails are heavily redacted, with many names and email addresses obscured.
